system-settings.name:
Enable Debug Logging
If you have the Stanford emLogger external module installed and configured, you can enable additional debug-level logging through this checkbox

project-settings.name:
This EM will automate the naming of records to allow constant record name size. If this project utilizes DAGs, the format of the record name will be either

{DAG ID}-{record number left padded to digit size} or
{DAG name}-{record number left padded to digit size}.

If DAGs are not used, only the Digit Size field is used - Use DAG name is ignored.

Number padding size
Number of total characters that will be used to create the number portion of the record name. The integer will be left-padded with 0s to maintain this size. (i.e 4 would mean the first record numeric portion will be 0001.

Use DAG name
When checked, the record name will use the DAG label instead of the DAG ID. For instance, if the DAG name is stanford and the DAG ID is 12, when this checkbox is checked, the record name will be stanford-0001. When not checked the record number will be 12-0001. If DAGs are not used in this project, this field is ignored.
